name: Lucifur: The Witch's Assistant
description:
Lucifur is the familiar of a witch and has been tasked with closing up her lair. Unfortunately for Lucifur, some rat ghosts are trying to sneak in and Lucifur must use the candlelight and his fireballs to keep them at bay and get out!

Blow out all of the candles and escape the lair before the ghosts catch you!

Made for the Abertay Game Developer Society Halloween Game Jam 2021.

Controls:

WASD: Move

Mouse: Aim

Left click: Shoot fireball

R: Respawn
